title: Episode 36: Questions and Answers
description:
We take a break from the narrative to answer listener questions on topics ranging from the organization of the revolutionary armies to pop culture to alternate history hypotheticals.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
